text.section: The commissioner may promulgate administrative regulations for the implementation and administration of the provisions of KRS 304.3-500 to 304.3-570.

An insurer shall not continue to utilize the services of a controlling agent on and after the effective date of KRS 304.3-500 to 304.3-570 unless utilization is in compliance with KRS 304.3-500 to 304.3-570.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 987, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 7, effective July 14, 1992.
